original_text: On the fifteenth day of that month the Lord’s Festival of Unleavened Bread begins; for seven days you must eat bread made without yeast.
korean_text: 이 달 열닷샛날은 여호와의 무교절이니 이레 동안 너희는 무교병을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: On the fifteenth day of that month
the Lord's Festival of Unleavened Bread begins
you must eat bread made without yeast
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 누룩 없이 만든 빵을 먹어야 한다
